001package squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.styled;
002
003/**
004 * The outermost class in the JSON that defines a tileset.
005 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 3/10/2015.
006 */
007public class Tileset {
008    public Config config;
009    public Maximums max_tiles;
010    public Tile[] h_tiles, v_tiles;
011
012    /**
013     * Probably not something you will construct manually. See DungeonBoneGen .
014     */
015    public Tileset() {
016        config = new Config();
017        max_tiles = new Maximums();
018    }
019}
